title: Sadyr Japarov - Wikipedia
snippet: Sadyr Nurgojo uulu Japarov (born 6 December 1968) is a Kyrgyz politician who has been serving as the sixth president of Kyrgyzstan since 28 January 2021. He previously served as the 22nd prime minister in the 2020 interim government, following the resignation of President Sooronbay Jeenbekov.

title: Biography
snippet: Biography, education and work experience of the President of the Kyrgyz Republic

title: Who’s In Charge Following Revolution in Kyrgyzstan? - Carnegie Moscow Center - Carnegie Endowment for International Peace
snippet: Today, Japarov talks a lot about patriotism and fighting corruption, but his opponents insist that as an adviser responsible for tackling graft under Bakiyev, he was in fact tasked with concealing corrupt schemes within the president’s inner circle.

title: Kyrgyz President Highlights Turkmenistan’s Neutrality - Caspianpost.com
snippet: President of Kyrgyzstan Sadyr Japarov has addressed the International Forum “Peace and Trust: Unity of Goals for a Sustainable Future,” held in honor of the International Year of Peace and Trust 2025, the International Day of Neutrality, ...
